'''Apocalypse Lost''' is a [[World Quest]] Series in [[Sumeru]].

Requirements: {{Quest|The Dirge of Bilqis;The Fallen Falcon|display=fullSentence|requirements=1}}

==Prerequisites== 
In order to start the quest series, the player must find all 5 [[Chess Piece]]s, of which 4 can be found while completing ''The Dirge of Bilqis''.
* [[King Deshret's Pillar]] (unlocked during ''[[The Temple Where Sand Flows Like Tears]]'')
* [[Border Fort]] (unlocked during ''[[Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part I]]'')
* [[Soulferry]] (unlocked during ''[[Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part II]]'')
* [[Khaj-Nisut (Quest Item)|Khaj-Nisut]] (unlocked during ''[[Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part III]]'')
* [[Temple of Gurabad]] (acquired while progressing through ''[["The Falcon's Hunt"]]'')

The chess pieces must then be placed in the glowing platforms at [[Safhe Shatranj]] during the Hidden Exploration Objective [[Chessboard of Safhe Shatranj]], which will trigger the initial portion of the quest-chain.
